Questions.Question1: Menim, da bi [ta] %VARIABLE% rad pogosto uporabljal.

Questions.Question2: %VARIABLE% se mi je zdel po nepotrebnem zapleten.

Questions.Question3: %VARIABLE% se mi je zdel enostaven za uporabo.

Questions.Question4: Menim, da bi za uporabo [tega] %VARIABLE%a potreboval pomočtehnika.

Questions.Question5: Različne funkcije [tega] %VARIABLE%a so se mi zdele dobro povezane v smiselno celoto.

Questions.Question6: %VARIABLE% se mi je zdel preveč nekonsistenten

Questions.Question7: Menim, da bi se večina uporabnikov zelo hitro nau cila uporabljati [ta] %VARIABLE%.

Questions.Question8: %VARIABLE% se mi je zdel neroden za uporabo

Questions.Question9: Pri uporabi %VARIABLE%a sem bil zelo suveren.

Questions.Question10: Preden sem osvojil uporabo [tega] %VARIABLE%a, sem se moral nauciti veliko stvari.

VariantGeneratorDescription: The slovene translation of the SUS by Blažica et al. is a peer-reviewed, validated and internally reliable translation of the original SUS questionnaire. In its publication not only internal reliability but also construct validity, concurrent validity and sensitivity could be shown.
